author: nurfikri89
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is to address the issue (cms-nanoAOD#586) regarding the slow speed of pileupJetId calculation in NanoAOD production. Now, only one instance of `PileupJetIdProducer` is scheduled and configured according to era. No changes in output is expected.

Below is a comparison of the cpu usage between `CMSSW_12_3_0_pre4` and this PR using a TTJets ULMiniAODv2 sample as input with 5000 events. 

**Default (`CMSSW_12_3_0_pre4`)**
![circle_nanodefault](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5868678/151963604-459ac64e-1688-4330-b034-3af389d0f222.png)

**This PR**
![circle_nanomod_puidcleanup](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5868678/151963634-28604d09-563b-474c-b2c0-3475836268a8.png)

#### PR validation:

passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`

#### Backports:
This PR should be backported 10_6_X  if there is a plan for Ultra-Legacy NanoAODv10 production in the future.
title: [NanoAOD] PileupJetId speed up
